snippet: Congress ought to hold hearings on the issue to save more lives on the waiting list and avoid having to pay donors for their organs.
abstract: Editorial warns of the dearth of kidneys available for transplant around the world; contends first step in easing shortage is to end current waste of organs; call for stronger national campaign to get more people to allow donation of their organs; urges Congress to look for more ways to reduce shortage.
lead_paragraph: Congress ought to hold hearings on the issue to save more lives on the waiting list and avoid having to pay donors for their organs.

headline.main: Ways to Reduce the Kidney Shortage
